messages.message:
does anyone know when we'll deprecate 24.07 so that we don't need to fix vulnerabilities for it anymore?

cc @Cody Boggs @Ashish @sudeep @Ram Prasanna

24.07 is supported until the end of June, 2026

each major IB classic release [xx.01 and xx.07] is supported for two years
I'm working on a plan to completely deprecate 24.07 release branch. I'll share the plan + timeline once ready

Yea as far as I know IB Classic / IB Platform / Enterprise (whatever we named it eventually :smile:) Is effectively perpetual until we are rid of all customers running one of those builds.

While the 'release' of 24.07.x will EOL June, 2026, the subsequent major 'releases' will get a fresh 2 year support timeframe, so this month's 25.07 release will EOL in 2027
:disappointed:
ohhh i didn't know that the support period is 2 years

major release [xx.01 and xx.07] support is 2 years

minor release [xx.04 and xx.10] support is 1 year
